alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 30 at 4:10AM PST until December 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches along Highway 2. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 15 inches for Blewett Pass. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Plain and Leavenworth. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, especially over Blewett Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snow intensity is expected Friday night into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Persons should consider delaying all travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.
